body_html: You might have better luck trying to use the Makefile approach in contrib/makefile, rather than bazel. We know it works for arm devices, and it currently doesn't link in any grpc code.
body_text: You might have better luck trying to use the Makefile approach in contrib/makefile, rather than bazel.  We know it works for arm devices, and it currently doesn't link in any grpc code.
body: You might have better luck trying to use the Makefile approach in contrib/makefile, rather than bazel.  We know it works for arm devices, and it currently doesn't link in any grpc code.
